resources.string: " \t\tWELCOME! \tTo the game of Balloon Analogue Risk Task For Youth "
For each pump you get rewarded in this game but remember balloons pops if you pump them up too much!!!
If a balloon pops, You will not get a reward you will have to wait for next balloon And try Again!!
Some of these Balloons might pop after just one pump others might not pop Until they fill the entire screen
It is up to you to decide how much to pump up each of the 30 balloons
You can stop pumping at any time by clicking on the "Fill Reward Meter" button
When the game is over, you will be able to collect a prize which will depend on how high your reward meter is
There are four types of rewards you can earn a small prize, a medium prize, a big prize and a bonus prize, your meter will show you hoe closer you are
Start the Balloon Game\n Click the button to start the game!!!!
In this game, you are asked to pump up 30 balloons
" You pump up on the balloon by clicking on the Pump button with your Mouse TRY IT!!! "
